amendment.description: To increase the amount of Army RDT&E funds available for the Broad Area Unmanned Responsive Resupply Operations (BURRO) aircraft program (PE 0603003A)

vote.text: Amendment SA 1225 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1225 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Dodd to Amendment SA 1217. (consideration: CR S9315-9316; text: CR S9316) To increase the amount of Army RDT&E funds available for the Broad Area Unmanned Responsive Resupply Operations (BURRO) aircraft program
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1225 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1225 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Dodd to Amendment SA 1217.
